1.0.0.name: wordpress/best-wp-security
1.0.0.description:
Easiest way to block IP's by range or Individuals IP.

Importance

To avoid attacks, This plugins gives you ability to block those IP's and display them a funny message :)

Usage:

It's easy! Once activated, Go to Settings -> WP Security. Add IP's Range or Individuals IP's to block them.

Notes:

This plugin for WordPress, the publicly available If you experience any problems with the plugin, feel free to contact me.
